name: hoover-zoom
title: hooverZoom
description: Display a linked image in a fullsize overlay on mouse hover.  Albums will show the current and total number of images in the bottom right corner, navigate them using the mouse wheel or left / right arrows.
author: arjuna@on-rope.net

preferences.name: maxSize
preferences.title: Maximum Popup Size
preferences.description: As a percentage of the main window.

preferences.name: addHist
preferences.title: Add to History
preferences.description: Milisecond delay after popup before adding to history, 0 is disabed.

preferences.name: blacklist
preferences.title: Blacklist
preferences.description: If checked Domain List is treated like a blacklist, otherwise it's a whitelist.

preferences.name: domainlist
preferences.title: Domain List
preferences.description: List of domains for black/white list seperated by commas.

preferences.name: keys
preferences.title: Keys
preferences.description: Enable keyboard control; left and right move through albums.
